Open the hood of your Audi A5 and inspect the front of the engine block. The VIN may be stamped onto the engine itself.

Manufacturing Details: The decoding reveals that the vehicle was potentially manufactured in Ingolstadt, Germany, providing a clue to its production origin and potential heritage.
